howItWorks.title: How to Play Sprunki Phase Games
howItWorks.description: Ready to start your Sprunki Phase adventure? Here's how to play! These simple steps work for all Sprunki Phase games, so you can jump right in and have fun!

step1.title: Pick Your Game
step1.description: Choose any Sprunki Phase game you like! Each one has its own fun style - from music making to spooky adventures!

step2.title: Use Your Mouse
step2.description: Click and drag things on the screen with your mouse. Move characters, press buttons, and create cool stuff!

step3.title: Special Keys
step3.description: Use your keyboard for extra moves! Space bar to start/stop, arrow keys to move, and number keys for quick actions.

step4.title: Have Fun!
step4.description: Try different things, make mistakes, and discover cool secrets! Every Sprunki Phase game has fun surprises to find.

tips.title: Helpful Tips
list: Try all the buttons - you might find something cool!
Mix different sounds to make awesome music
Play with friends to discover more fun stuff
Don't worry about making mistakes - that's part of the fun!

gameTips.title: Fun Tips for Sprunki Phase Games
gameTips.description: Want to have more fun with Sprunki Phase? Here are some cool tips and tricks to help you enjoy every game in the series!

basics.title: Getting Started
basics.description: New to Sprunki Phase? Start with the easier games like Phase 1 or 2. Take your time to learn the controls and have fun exploring!

progress.title: Level Up
progress.description: Try different Sprunki Phase games to find your favorite! Each phase has its own special style - from music to adventures!

special.title: Cool Moves
special.description: Look for special powers and abilities in each Sprunki Phase game. Try mixing different actions to discover fun surprises!

multiplayer.title: Play Together
multiplayer.description: Many Sprunki Phase games are more fun with friends! Team up, share tips, and help each other unlock new stuff!

secrets.title: Find Secrets
secrets.description: Every Sprunki Phase game has hidden treasures to find! Click around, try new things, and see what cool stuff you can discover!

extraTips.title: More Fun Tips
list: Take breaks between games to stay fresh
Try all the different Sprunki Phase games
Share your favorite moments with friends
Don't forget to save your progress

faq.mainTitle: Sprunki Phase FAQ - Your Questions Answered!
faq.description: Got questions about Sprunki Phase games? We've got fun answers! Here's everything you need to know about our awesome game series!

whatIs.question: What is Sprunki Phase?
whatIs.answer: Sprunki Phase is a super fun series of games that everyone can enjoy! We have 10 different phases, each with its own special style. Some are about making music, others are about adventures, and some are even a bit spooky! It's like having 10 different games in one big family!

howToStart.question: How do I start playing Sprunki Phase?
howToStart.answer: It's super easy! Just pick any Sprunki Phase game you like - they're all fun to play! You can start with Phase 1 if you're new, or jump into any other phase that looks cool to you. Each game has simple controls and helpful tips to get you started!

phases.question: What's different about each Sprunki Phase?
phases.answer: Each Sprunki Phase is special! Phase 1-2 are great for beginners and music lovers. Phase 3-4 are more spooky and exciting. Phase 5-6 let you make awesome music. Phase 7-8 are perfect for party fun, and Phase 9-10 have the coolest adventures!

gameplay.question: How do the games work?
gameplay.answer: Playing Sprunki Phase games is easy and fun! Just use your mouse to click and drag things around, and your keyboard for special moves. Each game has its own cool features to discover, and you can play at your own pace. Don't worry about making mistakes - that's part of the fun!

multiplayer.question: Can I play with friends?
multiplayer.answer: Yes! Many Sprunki Phase games are more fun with friends! You can team up, share your creations, and help each other discover new things. Join our community to meet other players and share cool tips!

progress.question: How do I get better at Sprunki Phase games?
progress.answer: Just keep playing and having fun! Try different things, explore each game, and don't be afraid to experiment. You can also check out our tips section, watch what other players do, and join our community for helpful advice!

help.question: Where can I get help if I'm stuck?
help.answer: We're here to help! You can check our game tips, ask other players in our community, or contact our friendly support team. Remember, every Sprunki Phase player was new once, so don't be shy about asking questions!

faq.needHelp: Still have questions about Sprunki Phase?

testimonials.title: What Players Love About Sprunki Phase
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our awesome players! They're having a blast with different Sprunki Phase games. Check out their fun stories!

player1.content: Sprunki Phase is amazing! I started with Phase 1 and now I've played them all. Each game is different and super fun. My kids love playing too - it's perfect for the whole family!
player1.name: Alex R.

player2.content: I love how every Sprunki Phase game has its own style! Phase 3 is spooky fun, Phase 5 lets me make music, and Phase 7 is great for parties. There's always something new to try!
player2.name: Sarah M.

player3.content: The music creation in Sprunki Phase games is so cool! I've made tons of awesome tunes, and sharing them with other players is super fun. It's like being a DJ and game player at once!
player3.name: Marcus D.

player4.content: Playing Sprunki Phase with friends is the best! We love trying different phases together and helping each other discover new things. The community is so friendly and fun!
player4.name: Luna K.

player5.content: Each time I play a different Sprunki Phase game, I find something new! The games are easy to learn but have lots of cool secrets to find. I can't pick a favorite - they're all great!
player5.name: Viktor N.

player6.content: Sprunki Phase games are perfect when I want to relax and have fun. Sometimes I make music, sometimes I go on adventures. It's like having 10 different games in one series!
player6.name: Yuki T.

controls.key: Drag and drop blocks onto the grid

blockBlastSolver.title: sprunki phase 3 Solver Instructions
blockBlastSolver.description: This is a tool to help you find the optimal solution in sprunki phase 3 game. Follow these steps:

steps.step1: Click or drag mouse to set initial blocks on the main board (shown in green)
steps.step2: Design your Figure shapes in the three small grids below (distinguished by red, yellow, and blue)
steps.step3: Click "Calculate Optimal Solution" to see placement suggestions

gameRules.title: Game Rules Tips:
rules: When 8 cells in the same row or column are filled, they will be automatically cleared
After clearing, other blocks remain in place (no gravity effect)
Three Figures can be placed in any order

interactions.clickOrDrag: Click or drag to set initial blocks
interactions.noValidPlacement: Current layout cannot place any Figure, please try another layout
interactions.continueDesigning: You can continue designing new Figures for the next round

introduction.title: Welcome to Sprunki Phase Games!
introduction.description: Hey there! Ready to jump into the amazing world of Sprunki Phase? It's a super cool series of games where every phase brings new adventures! From making music to solving puzzles, there's something fun for everyone. Let's explore all 10 phases together and see what makes each one special!
highlights: Start with Phase 1's fun music maker
Get spooky in Phase 3's scary world
Mix beats in Phase 5's cool studio
Make friends in Phase 7's party zone

phases.title: Your Sprunki Phase Journey
phases.description: Each Sprunki Phase is like a new chapter in an awesome story. Start anywhere you want - every phase has its own cool stuff to try!
